stories.headline: UN Security Council Approves Major Humanitarian Aid Resolution for Gaza
stories.summary: This marks a critical diplomatic breakthrough, aiming to ease severe suffering and stabilize the volatile region.

stories.headline: Tech Giant Unveils Breakthrough Energy-Efficient AI Processor
stories.summary: This innovation promises to dramatically cut data center power consumption, impacting global sustainability efforts.

stories.headline: ECB Signals Potential Interest Rate Cuts Amidst Economic Slowdown
stories.summary: This move aims to boost investment and consumer spending across the Eurozone, impacting global markets.

stories.headline: Novel Malaria Vaccine Shows Promising Phase 3 Trial Results
stories.summary: This breakthrough offers hope for eradicating a disease that affects millions, especially in Africa and Asia.

stories.headline: US Congress Passes Landmark Infrastructure Modernization Bill
stories.summary: This bipartisan legislation aims to create jobs, upgrade critical infrastructure, and boost long-term economic growth.
